543.question: how is mitigation of gender bias evaluated?
543.response: {'Answer': 'Mitigation of gender bias can be evaluated using   perplexity,  PPL, as shown in Image 0. PPL measures how well a language model can predict the next word in a sequence, and lower PPL indicates better performance. Mitigation of gender bias can also be done by using  log probability, as shown in Image 1.'}
